Payflo Payroll Solution Theme

A professional Astro 5 fintech theme with 12+ pages, 25+ components, and complete blog system for payroll and embedded finance companies. Built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, featuring full accessibility compliance and performance optimization.


Technologies:

  • Astro 5.7
  • TypeScript
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Content Collections


A professional Astro 5 theme designed for fintech and payroll solution companies that need to demonstrate complex B2B software capabilities through clean, modern web experiences. Perfect for showcasing API-first infrastructure, embedded finance solutions, and developer tools.

Whether you're a fintech startup, established payroll provider, or SaaS platform adding embedded finance, this theme provides everything needed to communicate complex technical solutions through compelling visual design. The component-driven architecture ensures rapid customization while maintaining professional aesthetics that convert visitors into customers.


The theme leverages Astro's island architecture for optimal performance, TypeScript for development confidence, and Tailwind CSS for maintainable styling. Perfect for companies in the embedded finance, payroll infrastructure, or developer tools space seeking to establish credibility and drive API adoption.
